thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Biodelivery Sciences Announces Belbuca Patent Litigation Settlement Agreement With Teva

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Biodelivery Sciences Announces Belbuca Patent Litigation Settlement Agreement With Teva
text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Biodelivery Sciences International Inc :
* BIODELIVERY SCIENCES ANNOUNCES BELBUCA PATENT LITIGATION SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT WITH TEVA
* BIODELIVERY SCIENCES - ENTERED INTO SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT WITH TEVA PHARMACEUTICALS USA, INC. AND TEVA PHARMACEUTICALS INDUSTRIES, LTD.
* BIODELIVERY SCIENCES - AGREEMENT RESOLVES BELBUCA (BUPRENORPHINE) BUCCAL FILM (CIII), PATENT LITIGATION AGAINST TEVA Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
